text: avvare avarkal (misraiyataintu) yusuhp munnilaiyil vantu avaritam; "ajise! Enkalaiyum enkal kutumpattilullavarkalaiyum peruntuyar parrikkontatu nankal corpamana porulaiye kontuvantirukkinrom; enkalukku nirappamakat (taniyam) alantu kotunkal; enkalukku (merkontu) tanamakavum kotunkal. Niccayamaka allah tanam ceypavarkalukku narkuli valankukiren" enru kurinarkal
